name: Desert Survival Kits
tooltip:
Desert Survival Kits

Bring 4 Globes of Water, 4 Powerful Anti-Venom and 4 Smoked Desert Dumplings to Calandrath at the inn in Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Globe of Water x 4
- Powerful Anti-Venom x 4
- Smoked Desert Dumplings x 4
